name: Notion Savings & Wishlist Template
description: Plan your 2024 savings with Notion!Notion is the best way to keep track of your savingsBut what if you're just starting out? What if you don't know where to start? What if your budget is overflowing with ideas but doesn't have any room for them? You've come to the right place! We've created a template that makes it easy for you to set up your Notion savings plan. It's completely customizable, so it can fit with your personal style and goals.Download now for free!What's included? Savings dashboar
features: Savings dashboard; Wishlist dashboard; Monthly views of your savings and wishlist; Planner for your savings each month; Shops, brands and categories menu; Dark & Light Mode; Can I personalize my template?Sure! Feel free to make any changes.; Still, have questions?No worries! Email me with any issues or questions atjotasuarezm@gmail.comor via Twitter @jotasuarezm.
